object.course_desc: An introduction to the Late Antique, Medieval and Early Modern worlds. Organized thematically, students will be introduced to interdisciplinary exploration of core topics.
object.course_extra_details:
Prerequisite(s): second-year standing.
Lectures and discussion groups three hours a week.

object.course_desc: Continued interdisciplinary study of the Late Antique, Medieval and Early Modern worlds, with a focus on how to develop a deeper analysis of the core topics examined in MEMS 2001.
object.course_extra_details:
Prerequisite(s): MEMS2001, or permission of the Program Coordinator.
Lectures three hours a week.
object.course_prerequisites: MEMS2001, or permission of the Program Coordinator.
